inn1.comm: full pitched ball at 136 kph, angling across and ending on off stump, defended off the front foot. Zak is already seeking movement.
hmm, poor start from Dhoni, Zaheer bowls a full length ball that swings late and slips down the leg side as Eric skips inside the line. Dhoni fluffs the collection
again on the pads, this time Eric is away with a neat clip through square leg for a couple. Nehra fields - his first World Cup game since the final of 2003.
back of a length from Zaheer, he moves over to the off stump line and Eric defends solidly as he pushes down the track
prodigious swing this time, at 127 kph and straightening through the air as Eric went for an expansive stroke. He curtailed his instinct and defended to the leg side
ends with one that holds its line, Eric sees it closely as lets it go outside off
full length ball on off stump, Barresi reaches out and defends to the mad at short cover
over-pitched on off stump at 131 kph, Nehra is offering them for the drive, but again Barresi finds short cover

this time Barresi finds the gap, he drives with opened wrists to elude the man at short cover, and backward cover point dives away to deflect it and keep it to two. No movement for Nehra yet, and he is bowling a foot further than he normall does.
full again, Barresi presses forward to defend into the off side
slow and sluggish start here from Nehra. He's once again over-pitched, this time on middle and leg, and Barresi has pounced on it with a half step forward and driven crisply to the right of mid off
that's the length, Nehra lands it a foot shorter than he has through the over, and gets it to slant across Barresi, eluding his faint poke, but not by much.
over-pitched well wide outside off, crunched without timing towards point
slightly closer to off stump, and not so full, Eric sees it through to the keeper

a shot that underlines just how hopelessly slow this pitch is. Full credit to Eric though, for playing a fine shot. Back of a length, this one hardly takes off from the track, and comes off slowly, Eric's stance is outside the crease and he continues to move down to meet the ball on top of what little bounce is there, and coaxes it in front of square for four
again, no bounce, Dhoni takes it after the second bump as Zaheer keeps it on a length and Eric leaves
Dr. Kotla and Mr. Hyde. This one takes off sprightly from a length and thuds into Dhoni's gloves at waist height.
ends with a confident check drive into the covers as Zaheer again keeps it back of a length. He hasn't moved the ball at this in this over.
length ball, turning in from off stump, defended to the off side
shortens the length on off stump and it is worked back to the bowler
strays on leg stump, worked off the pads through square leg for one
on leg stump again, Eric looks to play softly to the on side and finds midwicket
again turning into the pads, Eric tucks it backward of square leg and gets one
on off stump to end the over, no width on offer from Yusuf, and Barresi defends back down the track
angles in from wide of the crease, and it is defended from the crease to the leg side
interesting delivery, seemed like a slower ball initially, but it came at 130.8 kph, curling in through the air and ending on the toes, Eric inside-edged the flick onto the pad

nicely done by Eric. Zaheer again slants it into the pads, this time he lands it short of a length, but once again Eric is chipping down the track to make his own pace. He nearly converts it into tha half-volley and on-drives with lovely timing past short midwicket
he walks out again, and gets a proper half volley, but is cramped for room and plays into the covers

hideously lazt start this from India. Back of a length and wide of off stump, Eric looks to steer and gets an under edge that goes between Dhoni and the wide slip. Surely Dhoni could have made a better effort and stopped the ball, but his half-hearted jump is of no use.
ends with a length ball a foot outside off, the damage for the over is already done and Eric lets this go
tossed up outside off, Barresi gets to the pitch and defends to the off side
aha, Barresi skips out but can't reach the flight and inside edges the loft onto the pad
this time on middle and leg, Barresi plays with the spin to the leg side
tossed up outside off, Barresi leans out and defends to the off side
he strolls out again, but Yusuf cannily holds the length back and forces him to inside edge the force down the ground
Yusuf has a maiden, getting one to drift from off to middle and leg, it is worked with the spin to leg slip
flighted on off stump, Eric reaches out and works it to the leg side
drift for Harbhajan, nearly foxes Eric there as he curls it from wide of the crease towards middle and leg. Eric flicks too early and the leading edge pops up to the right of the pitch
Eric jumps out, almost yorks himself but manages to work with the spin through wide mid on
Barresi paddles from outside off, nicely controlled shot wide of leg slip for one
the one that goes straight, back of a length and Eric plays back to defend into the off side

again a hint of drift, Eric reads it well this time, doesn't get too far across and flicks from the leg stump line where it lands. A couple of runs, Harbhajan is unhappy with the effort. Nehra was the man at deep midwicket. A mismatch of expectations?
Yusuf bowls the armer it hurries through on off stump and is defended back down the track
this one drifts onto the pads, and it is clipped backward of square for one
back of a length outside off, played off the back foot towards mid on
more air this time, Borren cleverly works it with the spin through square leg for one more
back of a length and forced back uppishly. Still lands safely short of Yusuf
back of a length again and turning in towards leg, clipped towards midwicket. Another quiet over from Yusuf.

lucky. Harbhajan delivers the straighter one, Barresi was no where near spotting it and played for the turn as he advanced and commited to the flick. The top edge popped up and landed safely in the covers.
this one is tossed up outside off, and Eric defends cautiously from the pitch of the ball
the doosra now, Eric spots it from the track since it is not too full and defends to the off side
this one turns down the leg side, Eric tries to dab with the spin but finds midwicket
back of a length and turning in from off stump, defended down the pitch
another one of 'em straighter ones. Eric jumps out, realises it is going the other way and defends with a straight bat
Yusuf spears onto the pads, worked again quietly to the leg side
back of a length on off stump, defended to the off side
whoa, was that a chance? Barresi gets a short ball outside off and plays an uppish pull just away from Yuvraj at midwicket
fuller this time, defended down the track and Barresi works it back to the bowler
he's really firing them in short of driving length, Barresi can't get it away for runs
ends with a slower one, fuller and on the stumps, clipped with the spin to the leg side
straightens from off stump, good delivery, searching for the bat pad gap and nearly finds it. Inside edge squeezes past leg stump wide of leg slip
back of a length on off stump, Barresi moves across to off stump and defends
once again, Harbhajan gets the straighter one to stop on Barresi, who doesn't spot it and turns the wrists too early. Leadind edge pops up but doesn't go too far.
aha, Barresi is looking to outwit Harbhajan with a jump and squeak before the ball comes, and ends up confusing Harbhajan to delivering a wide down the leg side
flatter and short outside off, Barresi chops it down to third man for a couple
slower through the air, but on the pads, and it is worked to the leg side
again turning in on the pads, and worked with the spin to the leg side.
leggie to start off, lands on a length on off stump and goes away. Defended to the off side
good one, slows it through the air and nearly gets Barresi to chip it back at him. Lands just short
on leg stump this time, Barresi can't get it away yet
aha, Chawla nearly strikes as Barresi jumps out too early and gets too close to the ball. He manages to bring the bat down just in time to squeeze an inside egded single to square leg

appeal for lbw, turned down and given as a leg bye. Dhoni decided to review it. This is going to be interesting. The initial replay suggested there was some glove on it as Eric went for a sweep to a full ball on off stump. If it hadn't hit the glove that would have been out. Now, the umpire says not out. And then says it is not a leg bye. I am stumped. The umpire is confused. He's asks Eric to go back to take strike. Not sure how he can do that. Ah, now he gets it right. Eric gets the single. But it seems unfair that this should cost India a review. The umpire said leg bye, which is what prompted the review in the first place - Dhoni assumed it had hit pad first and hence was in for a chance to get the lbw. Reversing the leg bye and penalising the review that was based on the legb-bye seems unfair. UDRS controversies and India - now that's unconditional love!
flatter and turning away, eventful over ends with a punch into the covers for one
tossed up on off stump, Barresi defends down the track
full delivery on the stumps, Barresi can't make contact with the sweep and it bobbles off the pads to slip. Polite lbw appeal, politely turned down
straightens from leg stump, defended to the leg side with the spin
Barresi gets the single this time, controlling the sweep and getting a single through backward square leg
shifts the line to outside off, punched back to the bowler off the front foot
flighted on middle and off, far better lengths from Piyush so far today, defended off the front foot down the track
again full on the pads, driven down to mid on
flighted on off stump this time, swept along to square leg for one more.

lovely shot from Eric to bring up 50. Sunny Gavaskar says that was a fine late cut. It was fine in more senses than one. Flatter leggie from Piyush, lands outside off and breaks away. Eric waits and then deftly opens the face of the bat to send it scurrying down to third man. Tendulkar had no chance to stop that.
tossed up this time, Eric skips out to the pitch and drives with the spin through mid off for one more
too close to cut, just outside off and Barresi gets an under edge that goes away safely as he looks to chop through the off side
tossed up on off, a hint of turn inwards - nothing major - and Eric works it with the spin for a single
fuller and on the stumps, flicked straight to the fielder at midwicket
a nothing ball. Drifting down the leg side with the spin from round the wicket. Swept from top of the bounce for a single to deep backward square leg
doosra from over the wicket, this pitch is too slow for that to bother Eric, who defends with consummate ease off the front foot
turning down the leg side, turned with the spin through square leg for one more. India continue to remain flat.
touch of drift towards off stump, Barresi reaches out to smother the inward turn and defend
turning away from off stump, defended with an opened face through backward point

at long last, Piyush Chawla's much feted and much hyped googly has made its presence felt. Anil Kumble would have called that a flipper, but this is Chawla's googly, it is generally shorter in length than the leggie, and skids along with the angle, with slight inward turn. The delivery's hopes of striking hinge on the batsman's propensity to cut. Eric did just that, ambitiously setting himself up for the square cut by getting back and looking to come down on it. He saw it sliding in and tried to arrest the shot and cover the line. Too late. The ball hurries through and thuds into middle and leg. Chawla looks relieved, big break this for him.
the leggie to Cooper first up, straightens from outside off and is defended to the off side
tossed up generously and big spin too, Cooper can't connect with the cover drive, Dhoni collects and whips the bails off, but Cooper never left his castle
too short this time, it is one of his problems - the tendency to drop short now and then. Cooper capitalises by chopping him away through point for a single
ends with a fuller one on the stumps, Barresi defends cautiously
tossed up from round the wicket, on off stump and driven right back at the bowler
nice turn, Harbhajan gets one to come in marginally from outside off as Cooper presses forward to defend. Appeal for lbw, but there was an inside edge there.
drops shorter and straighter, Cooper gets inside the line anc clips it square for a single
fired on the pads at 87 kph, straightening and hitting the front pad, but that was missing leg
smart collection from MSD, Harbhajan over-pitches outside off, nearly yorking Barresi who missed the sweep
holds it back in the air, Barresi eases the front foot across and works it to the leg side
generous flight outside off, crisp cover drive from Cooper but he finds the fielder
the short ball now, Cooper prances onto the backfoot and cuts backward of square for one
flight at 83 kph on off stump, Barresi gets to the pitch and drives against the spin through mid on for one
and the googly again, skids in sharply, aiming at the pads, but Cooper spots it and defends from the crease
huge legspin this time, Cooper misses the cut as it breaks past him prodigiously
tossed up on off stump, Cooper reaches out and defends with the spin
turn straight away, from back of a length, Barresi stays back and works against the spin through midwicket
tossed jup at 79.5 kph on off, driven solidly down to long on for a single
flatter and on the pads, turned away with the angle through square leg for one
straightens from off stump, defended down the track
this time he lands it on the pitch. Driven with the spin just past short mid off for one

Barresi reviews an lbw call. Yuvraj gets one of those innocuous pies to land on off from wide of the crease, and straighten enough to hit middle stump. Umpire Davis did not take long to uphold the appeal. The only bone of contention was whether it hit bat before hitting the pad. Replays show it his the front pad first alright. A 100 ODI wickets for Yuvraj.
sublime. Chawla is looking ti flight them, and entice the drive. No problems this time for Cooper, he leans out to the pitch and drives smoothly through the covers
shortens the length on middle and off, Cooper stays back and defends
tossed up outside off, Cooper drives through the covers for one more
one of 'em deliveries that skids along, Tendo pushes his front foot across and doesn't get bat on it.
the leggie now, Piyush is mixing them up well, Tendo opens the face and adjusts for the spin to pick a single through cover point
another ripping googly that hurries past Cooper in a blink. He though of the cut, the heave, the forced pull, but the ball shot through before he could play any of those.
looped up slowly on middle and off, defended calmly down the track
Yuvraj spears another one without much spin as Tendo reaches out to defend. Bat first this time. Stifled appeal.
Tendo skips out gingerly, but Yuvraj holds the length well back and forces him to defend in ungainly manner
this one drifts in towards the pads and Tendo works to the leg side for one

Cooper escapes, Raina's thrown to the wrong end. Short ball outside off, dabbed to the right of Raina at point. Cooper thought there was a single. Tendo knew there wasn't one. Cooper was halfway down when Raina collected. He, however, threw to the bowler's end where Tendo was well in.
tossed up and breaking away, Cooper plays with an angled face through backward point for one
flighted on leg stump, defended compactly off the front foot
shorter on the pads, Cooper hangs back and whips off his legs to the deep for an easy couple
misfield from Kohli, the young guns aren't exactly heaping themselves with glory. Cooper drives with the spin through Kohli at cover for one
Tendo leans out to cover the deviation of Chawla's ripping leggie and defends to the off side
googly this time, Tendo did well to hangs back and spot it. He forces it against the deviation into the off side
interesting cut from Tendo, moves across to off stump, waits for the turn away and then plays it very late to the left of Raina at point for one
Yuvraj again looking for that innocuous lbw, getting one to drift into the line of the stumps and straighten. Defended with bat and pad close together to the off side
Tendo jumps out of the crease and is halfward down when he misses the dab to the leg side and is hit on the pads. Even Yuvraj doesn't appeal.
again, a very late steer to the off side as Yuvraj gets one to go away from him
Tendo gets the single, conscious to play with bat in front of pad, poking with the spin into the covers for one
Yuvraj strays onto the pads, Cooper nudges him delicately through square leg for a couple
flighted on middle and leg, Cooper stays beside the line and drives between Yuvraj at silly mid off for another single

Has Chawla put him down? Full delivery on the stumps, Cooper punches it back without quite getting to the pitch and it hurries back towards Chawla who can't hold on. He was surprised, and went with the right hand.
tossed up and breaking away, RTD works it with the spin to the off side.
the wrong 'un, as always dropped short and allows RTD to go back and work it to the off side
RTD reaches out to the flight of a delivery outside off stump and gets a single through the off side
lovely delivery, Chawla gets one to drift in towards off stump, land and deviate away like a fiend. Cooper did well to not edge it.
over-steps with the googly. Cooper slips straight to midwicket. He'll widn up now.
gets away with a scratchy short ball well outside off that Cooper doesn't quite carve over the infield. He mistimes into the covers for one and looks at the bottom of the bat.
tossed up on off stump, Cooper reaches out to defend with the spin to the off side
breaking away from off stump, played sedately into the covers
similar line, 83.5 kph and not much turn, Cooper focuses on covering the line and defending.
more air, straightens from leg stump and Cooper defends down the track
looped up on middle and leg, defended again. Yuvraj on a maiden.
another tough return chance spilled. Again, not even close to easy. Yuvraj tosses up on middle and leg, Cooper slaps it back to his left and very low. Yuvraj gets a hand to it, but can't hold on.
slow and turnin in from outside off, defended sedately into the off side
Yusuf gets this to break into the pads and it is clipped to the leg side
RTD skips out, gets to the pitch and closes the face to get a single through midwicket
short of a length and drifting into the pads, Cooper clips through backward square leg for one
RTD eases a boundary away. Yuvraj drops marginally short, RTD spots the indiscretion early, rocks back and punches it into the vast untenanted gap in covers for four.
fuller this time, RTD covers the line and defends to the off side
pre-meditated sweep from Cooper, he was looking to paddle it from short of a length and well outside off. No luck in getting bat on that.
length ball on the off stump, defended down the track

lovely improvisation. Cooper decided early that he was going to play the reverse paddle, Yuvraj helped matters by dropping it full and outside off, Cooper slapped it on the bounce and send it wide of short third man. The ball gathered speed as it went. Harbhajan at short third man did not.
short this time, a little ragged from Yuvraj and Cooper cuts in front of square. Tendulkar does well to run across from deep backward point and keep it to a couple
Cooper gets another single, dabbing into the covers with the spin
Yuvraj ends the over with a ripper that spits past RTD's forward poke. Even Dhoni could not collect that, it spun a mile and some more.
length ball on off stump, worked with the spin to the leg side
short ball, Cooper pounces on it with the pull and times the shot well. He finds Tendulkar in the deep though
polite lbw appeal, Yusuf gets one to come in a touch as RTD presses outside the line. Surely hit him outside the line of off stump
similar ball, again RTD gets forward and across to cover the line and play into the covers
RTD jumps out and works with the spin, but can't get it past midwicket
a single from RTD to end the over, over-pitched on the toes and whipped effortlessly to the deep
back of a length on off stump and defended into the off side

Yuvraj does it again. Best spinner in this team? He's done in Netherlands' best batsman with a bit of old-school left-arm spinner's guile. He's got this to dip on RTD after inviting him out of the crease for the loft down the ground. RTD did not realise he wasn't to the pitch of it, until too late, and decided to go through with the shot. He was looking to go leg side, but the extra spin meant that it went off the lower half of the bat, getting a bit of outside edge in the process. He ended up scooping it higher than he wanted, compromising for distance, and playing to towards long off as the bat turned in his hand. Zaheer at long off makes a tough catch look easy, taking it a foot in front of the ropes.
sharp turn away from outside off, Cooper can't get bat on it
this one hurries through into the batsman who plays it back to the bowler
on the pads this time, speared in at good pace and swept away for a single
slows it up in the air and gets Kervezee to defend off the front foot

Nehra's struck immediately. He's got this oldish ball to nip away from a full length. Was that reverse swing or a good old offcutter? In any case, it was Nehra at his crafty best. Replays indicate it was an offcutter. He bustles in from over the wicket, lands it full and outside off, inviting the drive and then moving off away towards the off side. The deviation is enough to induce an outside edge as Cooper goes for the big cover drive. Dhoni holds the low catch easily. Netherlands are fumbling here.
again, Nehra gets it to shape away, Zuiderant is crease-bound and poking at it in French cricket style. Miss
again, Nehra is bowling diagonals across the pitch and it is not easy at the best of times, leave alone when you are new at the crease.
a minor victory for Zuiderant who gets bat on it, and pokes it to the off side
fuller length this time, Zuiderant opens the face and dabs it towards point
another lively offcutter to end the over, moves away prodigiously from leg to off and Zuiderant does well not to get a leading edge as he plays the flick a touch too early
angles in from wide of the crease, holds its line after landing on a length and is defended to the off side
sharp inward curve this time, Kervezee does well to cover the line and not get the front foot across. Defended down the track.
full delivery, looking for the reversing yorker. This one is at 127 kph and lands on a full length. Kervezee plays into the off side

this time he moves it the other way from short of a length, Kervezee dabs to the off side and thinks of a single. He changes his mind in time, Kohli collects and throws the stumps down but Kervezee is safe
the one that holds its line this time, at 133 kph and it gets the outside edge as Kervezee limply hangs an angled bat out. Single to third man

Zaheer has nailed him, but Zuiderant has reviewed it. Sleight of hand from Zaheer, he's got the ball to do everything except turn back towards him. He runs in with the ball hidden in his hands, not giving away how he's holding it. This one lands back of a length and curls into Zuiderant, who has thrust his front pad forward and in front of the stumps. Danger signs. The ball comes in enough to miss the bat that was hanging in hope next to the pad. Replays vindicate Steve Davis. The seamers have come into their own with the old ball. Maybe India should just open with spinners and use the fast bowlers after 25 overs.
over-pitched outside off, this time Nehra doesn't get it to move, and it is driven without timing to cover
full again, 134 kph on middle and off, and it hints at moving away. Kervezee manages to force it back past the bowler for one
this one reverses away, at 130 kph, and de Grooth does well to cover the line with an opened face and play into the off side
back of a length on the stumps, de Grooth stays on the crease and defends to the leg side
looks for the yorker, but lands it at 136 kph on the pads. de Grooth can't get bat on the flick
slower ball, back of a length on the stumps to end the over, defended to the leg side cautiously
Zaheer continues to get away curve, Kervezee mistimes the drive to the off side
back of a length on the pads, worked to the leg side off the back foot
yorker, lethal even if at 130 kph. Kervezee manages to get bat on this and toe-end it to midwicket
full length at 130 kph, played back down the track to Zaheer
full pitched outside off, driven into the covers without timing
ends with one that curves into the toes, de Grooth clips through square leg for a single to end the over

Nehra is doing the exact opposite of what Zaheer is doing. Two left-arm seamers can't be more different if they try to. While Zaheer keeps bringing them in, Nehra keeps tailing them away from the right handers. This time, it is defended as it swerves towards off stump
too ambitious. He lands outside leg and too full, de Grooth clips through square leg for a couple
this one finishes well outside off and is steered with an angled face towards point
off cutter, lands on a length and nips away, defended from the crease to the off side
the crowd goes bonkers as Sachin has thrown down the stumps. No chance for a run out though, clipped softly through square leg for an easy single
this one keeps low outside off, Kervezee has to adjust and crouch as he defends to the off side
full toss on the stumps, but it dips alarmingly and squeezes onto the pads under the attempted sweep

de Grooth is run out. This innings is a complete shambles now, and the packed stands in Kotla will be concerned they won't get to see much of a chase. There was no single there. Kervezee works Yuvraj towards short midwicket and takes off. Chawla at mid-on runs in, collects with one hand and lets rip a throw at Dhoni. It wasn't the best of throws, but it was such a madly judged run that Dhoni had a year to collect and break the stumps. de Grooth started running really late, he knew it was suicidal.
tossed up and straightening from middle, defended in an edgy manner down the track
Borren leans out and gets to the pitch of the ball as he defends to the off side
well-hit by Borren, and a rare boundary. He drops his front foot across and whacks a flighted ball, in the air over midwicket. The very definition of against the run of play.
tossed up on the pads to end the over, Borren gets the front foot across again and paddles backward of square for one
topspinner on off stump to begin the over, Borren reaches out and gropes into the forward defensive
comes in with the angle from outside off, defended with the spin to the leg side

huge appeal for lbw from Harbhajan as he gets ont to break in and hit the pad as Borren looks to work it round the corner. Humourous gesture from Dhoni as Bhajji asks if they should review it. Nods his head with a "you got to be kidding" kind of air. It was missing leg alright.
turns sharply down the leg side and Borren gets a leg bye through fine leg
turning into the pads, dabbed with the spin through square leg for one more
tossed up on off to end the over, Borren reaches out to smother the spin
slow and short and turning as the batsman advances. He is forced to defend down the track.
Kervezee gets four, skipping out and to the leg side, taking him close to the pitch while also giving him the room to swing over the vacant long-on area.
Yuvraj responds with the skidder that comes in, Kervezee waits and angles it away backward of square leg for one
interesting shot from Borren, standing back in the crease and playing a paddle flick of sorts through square leg
angling into the pads again, Kervezee punches through the straight field for another single
good over for the Dutch, Borren plods his front foot to the pitch and dinks a single through mid on
Harbhajan lands this outside leg and gets it to turn further down, flicked with the spin through the leg side for one
drifts this one towards off stump and gets it to straighten, defended down the track from the crease
too straight this time, and worked with the spin to the leg side for one more
Borren reaches out to the flight outside off and defends into the offside
nicely whipped by Borren, reaches out and flicks through midwicket for a couple.
leans out to the flight of a ball on off stump and defends back down the track

and Chawla has a wicket first ball. He looks almost embarassed. Harbhajan at midwicket takes the catch at midwicket and must be wondering why he's not getting these freebies. That was dropped in Chawla's half. It was a miracle it did not bounce again before Kervezee hit it. He flat-batted the pull with such blinding ferocious intent that he forgot to place it. He picked out Harbhajan at deep midwicket.
not sure what that hit. Googly from Chawla, and on replays a sure edge as he poked for it. Dhoni missed it as it deviated away from him, and they get some runs through third man
ripping leggie from outside off, Kruger lets it go
slides another leggie short and on the pads, it is clipped off the back foot through square leg for a single

awry paddle sweep from Borren, just put his front foot across and planted the bat at an angle. It duly took the top edge, and popped up backward of square on the leg side, but there as no one to catch it
straighter one to end the over, hurries through outside off as the batsman leaves
drifting into the pads, Borren reaches across and helps it along through backward square leg for a single. It went off the pad.
short of a length, floater outside off, punched straight at Chawla who fumbles at point and gives the single away
tossed up on off stump, Borren leans out and smothers the spin
turns into the pads this time, Borren dinks it backward of square leg for a single

Harbhajan appeals hard for an lbw, umpire says no, Dhoni smiles and says no review, Harbhajan smiles back. Big spinning offie, lands just outside off and bursts in to hit the pad in front of middle. But that was surely going down the leg side. "Beech mein maarna padega," yells Dhoni. ["It needs to hit middle."]
fullish ball on off stump, worked with the spin through mid on
tossed up on off, Borren drives it before it lands through mid off for a single
over-pitched on middle and off, square-driven with an angled face through point for a single
flighted leggie on off stump, Borren reaches out and defends to the off side

Borren did well to get bat, or glove or whatever on that. Googly, hurries in sharply as Borren plays the cut. He was not even near picking it, and it hit the inside edge just before hitting the pad. Borren looks sheepish.
forces with the spin through the off side
this one breaks past his prod, Dhoni collects and lets out a long ponderous appeal for caught behind, but it seems to have missed the edge
loopy delivery on off stump, defended back as it straightens
drifts onto the pads, worked through backward square leg for a single

Borren's just managed to get his lofted cover drive over the head of the man standing close in. Looped up on off, he jumped out and looked to carve him inside out. Got just enough bat to ensure he picked four
another adventurous paddle from Borren, leans out and dabs backward of square leg for a couple
this one hurries in with the arm, Borren defends off the front foot
Borren's taken a liking to Yuvraj. Gets a fullish ball on the leg stump and responds with a whole-hearted swipe across the line. He timed the hit really well and got it away through midwicket.
friendly full toss from Chawla to begin the Powerplay, and Kruger gleefully dumps it through the covers after strutting out of the crease. It came at a nice hitting height too.

Another run out, this time Kruger is gone. Chawla lands it this time, but too full and there for the drive. Kruger times the shot well as he advances and flows through the shot, but picks out Kohli inside the circle at cover. He promptly returns to Dhoni who is quick with the collection and removes the bails in a flash.
Bukhari is not going to poke around. Tries to slog his first ball through the leg side, but ended up playing straight to midwicket
Chawla gets the length right and gets it to turn away from Bukhari who dabs with the spin into the covers for one

Borren has dumped Chawla over long on. Such a free-spirited slog, he just seemed to enjoy lacing into the length ball. Turning away from off and middle, Borren gets the front foot across and thwacks it with a crossed bat over the straight field. As Ravi Shastri would say, "That went, many a mile."

another six here. Borrn has ruined Chawla's figures by taking 17 off the final over. This was more of a damage control ball. Flat and full on middle and leg, Borren again swept with power, getting the shot to fly away over midwicket. Fiercely powerful hit.
back of a length to begin the over, Bukhari can't get the single away
another dot ball, Bukhari stays on the crease and plays back down the track
now he hands it to Borren, gets one on the pads and clips square for a single
slower ball on Borren's pads, he's managed to glance it square for a single

whoa, another six. Netherlands are leaving India oranje-faced with a big sting in the tail. Nehra is still looking for the tight yorker. It doesn't require much to go wrong, for that to end up as a half-volley on the pads. Bukhari got the front foot inside the line and tonked it wildly over long on. Part golf, past cricket.
aha, bad luck now for Nehra. He delivers a smart offcutter, full on middle and leg stump, Bukhari can't pick it and plays all over it, and ends up getting a leading edge to third man for four
begins with a near-yorker on Borren's toes, he can't force it away through the off side, but gets a single
another full ball on off stump, Bukhari digs it out to the off side for a single
slow offcutter, Zaheer gets it to nip away from leg stump and Borren plays it uppishly to the leg side.
slower ball again, this time he misses the line and lands it on leg stump. Borren tries to shovel it past short fine leg, but can't get the gap
low full toss on off stump, Bukhari is not good enough to get under it and find a way to muscle it into the off side
another low full toss, that's not a bad option in these circumstances. Bukhari drives straight to long off for a single
tossed up on middle and off and straightening, defended rom the crease to the leg side
Bukhari turns it over, works him with the spin through midwicket for one more
looped up on leg stump, Borren quietly drives past the bowler for a single
full toss on the pads, Bukhari swipes it straight to the fielder at midwicket

India leaking runs like a metro-water lorry in Chennai. Fires it full on leg stump, Bukhari's footwork is good enough to get under it and swing it over midwicket. The crowd is caught between anxiety and cheer.
ragged. Harbhajan loses the plot and lands this wide down the leg side
ends with a yorker. A rare toe-crusher from an offspinner. Bukhari manages to squeeze it out.

Borren summons his inner Dilshan, and plays his own version of the pick-up shot. Or the ramp shot if you will. Pre-meditated though, and that led to his undoing. Back of a length from Zaheer as Borren set himself up for a full delivery. As a result, instead of scooping, he ended up lapping it off the lower end of the bat. Hence it went higher rather than far. Instead of clearing Nehra, it landed in his hands at short fine leg. Good innings from the captain.
yorker first up, on middle and off, Bukhari digs it out
Bukhari plays the pull so early that he gets it out to cover. Short of a length ball from Zaheer, meets Bukhari's swipe rather early and runs away to the off side

Zaheer has arrested the bleeding and finished off the innings. Despite the late flourish, Netherlands end short of an average score. The fast searing yorker angles across the batsman, there's not much you can attempt with that ball, except the squeezed single to the off side, or a tough-to-pull-off delicate dab to third man. Bukhari just went for the big swipe across the line even as he backed away. Ended up getting an inside edge that clattered onto off stump. India need 190 to win.

inn2.comm: Another first-ball four from Virender Sehwag. He whipped this short-of-length delivery from the middle stump line to square-leg boundary
gets behind the line to defend it to the off side of the pitch
hits this on the up and to mid-on
on the middle stump line, pushed towards mid-on
Twhack.he leaned forward and across to play this on the up and through extra cover
on the off stump line and Sehwag punches it back to the bowler
He has a short fine-leg fielder and he sprays this full on the pads; Tendulkar wrists it past that short fine
gets forward to work the cutter to short midwicket
drifts to the pads again, dabbed to short fine-leg . Missed out an opportunity to collect a four there
lovely drive .. he leaned forward to caress the full delivery past Sehwag and the mid-on fielder makes a good diving stop
The errors keep coming: Yet another delivery on the pads and Tendulkar puts it to the recycle bin
lands just outside the off stump and Tendulkar drives to cover
pushes this to the off side. He has been out, getting some leading edges on attempted whip to the on side
this one is on the pad, clipped over square-leg but there is a fielder in the deep who mops up
around the off stump line, pushed out to cover
full pitched delivery on the off, another pleasing off drive but straight to mid-off
good-length delivery just outside off, pushed out to cover
moves in towards off stump,defends to the bowler
full pitched delivery and Sehwag shapes for the big hit but finds the man at mid-off
shortish delivery and Sehwag goes for the pull,. doesn't connect well and the ball lands short of mid-on
slips a wide down the leg side, going for the slower one
quicker but again down the leg side. Steve Davis, officiating in his 100th ODI, extends his arms
serves a full length delivery outside off and Sehwag slices it down to third man
Beautiful! He walked down the track, leaned forward, opened the bat-face and punched a length delivery sweetly through covers
full delivery well outside off and Tendulkar reaches across to cream it through covers again.
Imperious! And that's 2000 World-cup runs for SRT. First player. He moved forward and lifted a length delivery on the middle-stump line high over mid-on. Both batsmen in some mood today
serves yet another delivery down the leg side
gets right behind the line to defend solidly to the off
on the off and middle line, Sehwag presents the full bat-face as he pushes it to mid-off
Awwww! It was a good-length delivery on the middle and Sehwag times it sweetly between the umpire and Tendulkar
leans forward to defend a good-length delivery back down the track
charges down the track and goes for a big heave-ho over mid-on but ends up dragging it of the inner edge to backward square-leg boundary

dropped by Eric ( I am not typing that surname boss!) at mid-on. Sehwag opened the stance and went for a flat-pull .. the ball flew to left of mid-on where Eric made a jumping effort but couldn't hold on. Tough chance that
leans forward to defend to short extra cover
threatens to jump out, sees the shortening of the length and works it through midwicket
flighted on a good length around off, driven to long-off
goes for the paddle sweep and edges it to his pad
around the off, pushed out to short extra cover
on the middle and leg, Tendulkar works it wristily past a very short fine-leg (say a leg gully for seamers position)to collect a boundary
another wide down the leg side.
on the middle, tapped to the on side
gets forward to ease this to mid-on
The white ball is flying here. Sehwag crash-pulled this weak short ball to the screaming crowd beyond midwicket
rushes down the track and punches a short-of-length delivery to left of mid-on
shuffles to the off and taps it to midwicket for a single
tires a slower one and Sehwag pulls it to deep midwicket fielder for a single
rushes down the track and lofts it high over extra cover boundary
Cute. He went back, opened the bat-face and late cut this one from the off and middle stump line to the third man boundary
Combusts this time! He moved outside leg and tried to whiplash it over point but ended up slicing it straight to the Kervezee at point
Slip in and he watches Yusuf Pathan get a full toss! Pathan swats it up and over midwicket
goes for a conventional sweep this time but edges it to short fine-leg
quicker, skids on towards the pad, rolls away to the on side
full delivery around off, pushed out to mid-off
on the middle stump line, turned through midwicket
caught in double minds there: he was threatening to go for a big hit but saw it was a slower one, adjusted to defend
good-length delivery on the middle, pushed back to the bowler
tries the slower one, drags it very short, Pathan ends up dragging it to square-leg
Whipped away! It was a full-length delivery on the pads, Yusuf picks it up and over square-leg
Wicket for no 2 for Seelaar. Two big wickets. Tendulkar went down the track for the big hit but ended up slicing it towards long-off who ran across to take a good catch
quickish delivery on the pads, rolls away to the leg side
gets forward to slam this to long-on
gets forward to ping long-on
Whoa! Seelaar is pumped up! It was a quickish delivery on short of length; Pathan pushes it tamely back to the bowler! what a soft dismissal. Seelar dashes off on a celebratory run!
leans forward to drive to short extra cover
steers this wide of backward point for a single
full delivery on the middle and off, driven back to the bowler
short in length, tapped to backward point. Gambhir wanted a single but got back in time
on the middle, nudged to short midwicket
whips this to right of square leg where a diving stop is made
slants across Gautam who tries to run it through vacant slips and is beaten
on the middle, pushed out to short midwicket
stretches forward to defend
leans forward to drive to mid-off
gets back to a good-length delivery and stabs it out to the off
slower, full on a length, tapped to the off
floated full on a length, driven to cover
short in length, around off, pushed to cover
on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
on the off stump line, defended to straightish midwicket

run out chance of Gambhir missed Virat works this through backward square-leg region  and wants the second. Gambhir is late to react and he suddenly starts to charge across; Kohli had returned to his crease by then. Gambhir turns and tries to scamper back but the bowler, standing mid-pitch, failed to collect the throw cleanly.
leans forward to defend
around the off stump, pushed to the off for a single
on the off and middle, tapped to midwicket
on the middle stump line, gets back to push it to midwicket
drags this short and Virat pulls it between midwicket and mid-on
gets back to punch this to extra cover
floated full outside off, creamed through covers for couple of runs
on the middle stump line. eased to short extra cover
gets forward to tap this past the non striker for a single
another long hop and Kohli puts it out of the misery; he drags it through wide midwicket

Clatter! It landed full on a length around off stump line  and moved in a touch. Virat went for the off drive but drove outside the line and the ball went through the big gap to peg back the off stump
full in length, around off, pushed back to the bowler
around the off stump line, defended to short cover
gets on the front foot to nudge this to cover
turns in from outside off, tapped to midwicket
works the ball behind square-leg for a single. 90 more to win
on the off stump line, flicked to midwicket
leans forward to defend this to the on side
nicely flighted, slower, fuller, loopy delivery, Yuvraj flicked it uppishly and just clear of the diving short midwicket fielder
slow through the air, Gambhir moves down the track to work it to midwicket
full in length, angling away from Yuvraj who runs it down to third man
gets forward to defend it back to the bowler
clips this past square-leg
moves forward to defend to the bowler
full in length on the middle, defended back down the track
around the off stump line, pushed to mid-off
rushes down the track and slams it aerially to the wide midwicket boundary
skips down the track, takes it on the full and whips it to wide long-on where Kruger makes a neat diving stop
The Gambhir special: He rushes down the track and drives inside-out through extra cover
leans forward to defend
turns in from outside off, dabbed to the off
goes down the track and defends like Ravi Shaz
Crash. Yuvraj leans forward and across to drive a full delivery through extra cover
gets forward to stab this to the off
full in length and outside off, mistimes it to cover
short and wide, Yuvraj slaps it through covers! Whack
on the off stump line, defended back down the track
flighted off break around the off stump, steered through point
It was short and wide, poor stuff, and Yuvraj crashes it through extra cover
flighted full around off, driven to extra cover
driven to the off side of the pitch
leans forward to defend to the off side
leans forward to nudge to the on side
fullish on the off, driven to mid-off
short in length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
cuts away from Yuvraj who pushes it quietly to the off
full in length, eased to sweeper cover
good-length delivery around off ,pushed through point
from round the stumps. full in length, pushed out to cover
skips down the track, gets outside the line and lifts it nonchalantly over mid-off
caresses it through point
leans forward to drive to short extra cover
leans forward to push this to the right of the bowler
gets down the track and whips it to deep midwicket
around off, driven to cover
full and well outside off, Yuvraj lifts it high in the air to long-off region
full in length outside off, driven to mid-off
on the off stump line, nudged to backward point
full in length on the off, defended to the off
short in length, on the off, pushed back to the bowler
drives this to mid-off/ 51 to win

The leg stump has been pegged back! It landed outside the leg stump and seemed to be a harmless delivery moving towards the pad. Gambhir shapes to work it to the on side, misses, and the ball clips the thigh pad and falls on the leg stump! The umpires have asked Gambhir to wait. They want to check for the no ball. It's a legit delivery. Out.
on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket
cuts in from the off stump line, from a good length, edges the defensive poke to his pad
gets forward to defend to short extra cover
gets on the front foot to defend to the on side
just outside off stump, Dhoni tries to punch it to off and edges it to the leg
short in length around off, pushed out to mid-off
full and well outside off, Yuvraj tries to slash it past point but makes no contact
gets forward to push-drive it to the bowler
stays back to defend this good-length delivery to the off
on the off and middle line, pushed out to the off
strays to the pads, turned down to fine-leg region
around the off stump, Yuvraj defends to the off
fuller, angling away from Yuvraj who pushes it to mid-off
short in length, just outside off, jabbed off the inner edge to his pad
drifts to the pad, flicked away for a single
short in length, pushed out to the on side
gets off the mark with a flick past square-leg
off cutter from the leg stump line, Yuvraj is squared-up and edges it to third man
wrists this behind square-leg
just outside the off stump, cut away to deep point
gets forward to drive to cover
just outside off, stabbed back down the track
leans forward and across to push it to the cover
quick and short of length, pushed to short mid-on region
presses back to punch a slightly short of length delivery through wide mid-off region
gets forward to drive to long-on
gets back to force it down to long-off
skips down the track and eases it to long-on
flighted around off, pushed through cover for a single
leans forward to push it to the off side
on the pads, clipped to deep square-leg region
tries to fetch this slightly short, and slower one, from outside off and goes for a big pull but no wood on leather
short in length and outside off, Yuvraj carves it past backward point
goes for the yorker, ends up a low dipping full toss, flicks it to fine-leg
slower one, on the leg stump line, turned past square-leg
on the pads, rolls away to the leg side
slips it very short, pulled away powerfully but straight to deep midwicket
leans forward, waits on the front foot, sees the spin, adjusts by opening the bat-face and steers to short third man
presses back to punch it back to the bowler
gets well back to push this to short extra cover
lunges forward to steer it to point
short and well outside off, Yuvraj goes hard into the shot and edges it to the leg
full in length on the off stump line, driven to long-off
fullish, on the middle and leg, tapped to midwicket
on the middle stump line, pushed to mid-off for a quick single
full in length around off, driven to long-off
full and outside off, pushed through to sweeper cover
on the middle stump line, skids on, Dhoni backs away and manages to get the bat down in a hurry to keep it out
strays to the pads, worked behind square-leg
low dipping full toss, driven to long-on
gets back, tries to create room and punch through the off side but edges it down the track
lunges forward to defend to the off
flighted delivery on a length, eased back to Seelaar
on the middle stump line, defended on the front foot
leans forward to flick it past square-leg
leans forward to push it back down the track
lunges across to push it to extra cover
gets on the front foot to drive to mid-off
on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket
drives on the up and straight to mid-off
droves this for a single to bring Dhoni on strike
shortish, bit of width outside off, cut away to sweeper cover
reaches across to tap to backward point
goes for the pull but mistimes it to short midwicket
slow off cutter, defended to cover
starts off with a whipped on drive through wide mid-on region
gets forward to smash it but straight to mid-off
short in length, goes back to clip it past square-leg
Smashed! Yuvraj nearly decapitated Dhoni with a drilled drive and smiles as he sees Dhoni get down on to the ground to evade the missile
tucks this past square-leg for a signle
strays to the pads and Dhoni helps it along to the fine-leg region to collect another boundary and India inch close to the winning line
short in length, punched to mid-on
a slower one, Yuvraj drags it down to deep midwicket
stays back to defend to cover
full in length, on off and middle, defended to cover
moves in from outside off, another defensive block
banged in short and it has been shoved past square-leg.. easy chance to take the single but they don't. Dhoni wants Yuvraj to take strike and hit his 50
full delivery around off, pushed out to mid-on
low full toss, smashed towards midwicket where a superb diving save is done
Yuvraj reaches his 50 and India cross the line with a powerful whippy flick to the square-leg boundary
